<<<<<<< HEAD
To the Honourable Committee of Kent T. B. (Thomas Belke)
8 p.
s.n., [S.l. : 1645]
Caption title. Signed: Thomas Belke. Pages 1-4 are personal legal queries; pages 5-8 are a petition for general circulation, composed by Belke and addressed to Parliament, asking liberty of conscience and equality in church government. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
